text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
And that's that for the Japanese Oaks!<n>Man, that
was a blast!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon really brought in the<n>energy again! I
can't wait for the Shuka<n>Sho!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
I think she's got some new merchandise<n>out. We
should go have a look!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
With two-thirds of the Tiara tour under<n>her belt,
Hishi Amazon is starting to<n>become a household
name.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Woo, that was some one-on-one allright! That's the Oaks for youâ€”all thoseracers out there were monsters!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe, thanks! But we're not done yet!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That second crown is definitely going to<n>Narita
Brian at the Japanese Derby next<n>week. This is no
time to get complacent.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna give the Shuka Sho everything<n>I've got,
so you'd better keep up with<n>me, Teach!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It's time to kick our training up a notch<n>for the
Shuka Sho!
